hero.headline: Hey, I'm ghotso ðŸ‘‹
hero.subline: Tech enthusiast, self-taught developer & automation nerd
hero.paragraph: I'm a self-taught developer with a passion for automation, APIs, and building cool stuff. I love anime & Japanese culture, enjoy gaming, and spend my time working on home server setups, monitoring solutions, and fun side projects. I work with Python, React, Node.js APIs, and I'm always learning and building something new.

whatILike.title: What I Like to Work On
whatILike.subtitle: Technologies and topics that excite me

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A bit about my journey and interests

journey.title: My Journey
journey.content: I'm a self-taught developer who fell in love with coding through curiosity and a drive to automate everything. My journey started with simple scripts and has evolved into building complex systems, APIs, and full-stack applications.

interests.title: What Drives Me
interests.content: I'm fascinated by automation workflows, API design, and home server setups. I enjoy tweaking systems to be neat and efficient, exploring new frameworks, and building both practical tools and fun side projects. When I'm not coding, I'm probably watching anime, gaming, or listening to music while working on the next project.

funFacts.title: Fun Facts
items: Big fan of anime and Japanese pop culture
Codes with music in the background
Loves tweaking systems for optimal performance
Always exploring new frameworks and ideas

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: This website does not collect, process, or store any personal data. No cookies, analytics, tracking, or third-party services are used. No contact forms or data collection mechanisms are implemented.
